name: Verify the Optin light box when user has already been checked it when do registration
id: stories/fp/lb/Optin.story;Verify the Optin light box when user has already been checked it when do registration

testSteps.description: Given Register a user with the Optins

exception.message: Expected enabled element was not enabled

rootCause.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for By.name: password to be enabled (tried for 25 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

children.description: Then Verify the absence of the Optin light box
And Verify the absence of the dbproperty 'optinshowed'

userStory.narrative:
In order to verify the Optin light box
As a user
I want to logged into the application with valid user name and password
